      ChronicleMapBuilder<K,V> ChronicleMapBuilder.defaultValueProvider(DefaultValueProvider<K,V> defaultValueProvider)
      Specifies the function to obtain a value for the key during get() and getUsing() calls, if the key is absent in the map.

      ChronicleMapBuilder<K,V> ChronicleMapBuilder.entryAndValueAlignment(Alignment alignment)

      Configures the entry size.

      ChronicleMapBuilder<K,V> ChronicleMapBuilder.immutableKeys()
